about_the_game:
Oppressed is a realistic single-player first-person shooter built using HDRP technology on the Unity game engine. It was made by an independent developer who loves horror thriller games. Bodycam camera and realistic gameplay give players an immersive experience.

This time the player will find himself in a dark, creepy, unsettling corridor full of anomalies. Perhaps he is not alone in these corridors. The player must overcome his inner fears, stay alert and carefully investigate the surroundings, solving riddles to discover the anomalies, discover the escape route and regain his freedom.

An experience with a surprise ending...

Story Sackground

Our protagonist Luke finds himself in a hallway with a gun on the floor, not knowing how he got there. He has no idea how and why he ended up here.

The writing on the walls tells him to move through the corridors and find anomalies.

Can Luke find out why he is in this dark and creepy corridor and, more importantly, how to get out of it?

Key Features

-Bodycam perspective gives players a realistic and stimulating experience

-Free aiming system with authentic ADS and unlimited hand gestures.

-Thrilling and scary experience with immersive sound effects and realistic visuals that create a thrilling atmosphere

-A suspenseful story with a surprise ending

name: Oppressed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible（DirectX 9.0c or higher）
  • Additional Notes: SSD Hard Drive
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K | AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 2070RTX | AMD Radeon™ RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible（DirectX 9.0c or higher）
  • Additional Notes: SSD Hard Drive

short_description: Our protagonist Luke finds himself in a hallway with a gun on the floor, not knowing how he got there. He has no idea how and why he ended up here. The writing on the walls tells him to move through the corridors and find anomalies.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
